column5: Well I read on here that some members took their kids to Golden Beach Resort and found it was a great place for a 1st camping trip.  We packed up the car with our tents, sleeping bags,fishing rods etc and headed for our 1st family camping trip. We arrived the 1st  night and set up and had a camp fire, roasted marshmallows, made smores and booked a boat for the next 3 days. We headed out for our  1st fishing trip with a brand new ugly stick for the boy that we needed to break in, we just set up in the weeds and picked on the  panfish and he kept on getting better and better.  The following days were much of the same but more and more fish, the highlight  had to be looking over at the boy struggling with a crappie which ended up joining us for a late night snack over the campfire, it  overshadowed my 22" walleye (released of course) that i fought for what seemed an eternity on my bobber and light tackle and barely fit into our  panfish net.
Great report. Fishing kids is always special.
Sounds like a great camping trip!!I'm sure the little man will remember it for a long time. Nice walleye btw.
wicked!  love these reports, the boy, mum and dad all look like they are having a blast!  outdoors fun for kids....always a good thing.
That looks like an awesome trip! Congrats on your first, and very successful, fishing trip!
Congrats on the great family trip. The lad is a good fisherman...an excellent hockey fan too!
looks like a great family trip
very well done!!!! memories to last a lifetime and the pics to prove it...your success was measured by the smiles of everyone....Congrates on a great report too
That's great, everyone looks like there enjoying themselves. How mant times has the young lad asked you, when are we going again?  I still remember my first trip at about the same age.
Gotta love family vacations...thanks for the report
looked like fun was had by all
My favourite kind of report!  Looks like a great time had by all!  Great stuff!
Great report I still remember fishing as a boy, with my dad.The menories last forever.
